# bio

Get fundamental information about a crypto

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/crypto bio symbol
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| symbol | Crypto symbol to check information (e.g., BTC) | False | None |


---

## Examples

```
/crypto bio symbol: btc
```
